options.text: "@@LEADER@@, how can you stand working in an office with a door barely attached to its hinges? People are going to think our nation is as broken as this door!" exclaims your secretary, @@RANDOM_NAME@@, after clearing away today's new petitions. "You need a brand new door. Oh! How about a rich Marche Noirian Mahogany? It would have beautiful ornamentation filled with national symbolism. Maybe we could replace the drapes while we're at it. That's sure to make @@NAME@@ look great again! Well, at the very least, your office will."
options.result: @@LEADER@@'s exquisite office door is replaced monthly due to angry petitioners

policiesAndNotabilities.full: sometimes adds notability: museums and concert halls
policiesAndNotabilities.name: museums and concert halls

policiesAndNotabilities.full: sometimes removes notability: punitive income tax rates
policiesAndNotabilities.name: punitive income tax rates

policiesAndNotabilities.full: sometimes removes notability: suspicion of poets
policiesAndNotabilities.name: suspicion of poets

options.text: "'I see random people of no importance barging in to your office and dumping all of their problems on your desk for you to handle!" shouts your head of security, @@RANDOM_NAME@@, while slamming the remainder of the office door. "Let me beef up your security here and install a sturdy iron door. Then only people with worthy issues will seek your counsel."
options.result: petitioners are increasingly resorting to climbing through @@LEADER@@'s window to draw attention to their issues

policiesAndNotabilities.full: sometimes adds notability: punitive income tax rates
policiesAndNotabilities.name: punitive income tax rates

options.text: "That's too old school!" interjects @@RANDOM_FEMALE_NAME@@, your nerdy niece. "Why not install a force field door? It could glow neon blue and look so cool and stuff! Force fields probably aren't radioactive, right?"
options.result: trespassers entering @@LEADER@@'s office are immediately vaporized

policiesAndNotabilities.full: sometimes adds notability: deadly medical pandemics
policiesAndNotabilities.name: deadly medical pandemics

options.text: "Why not make yourself a little spending money?" suggests wealthy industrialist Edward Rump as he adjusts his toupee. "You should have a yuuuuuge statue of yourself in front of the door. @@DEMONYM_PLURAL@@ insert credits into the statue, and you can judge their worthiness based on how much they pay their respects." [color=blue]Must have private industry[/color]
options.result: @@DEMONYMNOUNPLURAL@@ must literally pay their respects to hear from their political representatives

options.text: "Why not make yourself a little spending money?" suggests surprisingly wealthy commissar Comrade Josephs as he adjusts his cap. "You should have a grand statue of yourself in front of the door. @@DEMONYM_PLURAL@@ insert @@CURRENCY_PLURAL@@ into the statue, and you can judge their worthiness based on how much they pay their respects." [color=red]Must not have private industry[/color]
options.result: @@DEMONYMNOUNPLURAL@@ must literally pay their respects to hear from their political representatives

options.text: "@@LEADER@@, tear down this door!" hollers a random jellybean-eating passerby who seems to have wandered into your office. "If you seek peace, if you seek prosperity for @@NAME@@ and @@REGION@@, tear down this door!" The interloper is promptly removed by security. [Validity TBD]
options.result: in a baffling press conference @@LEADER@@ proudly dismantled a broken door

policiesAndNotabilities.full: sometimes removes notability: punitive income tax rates
policiesAndNotabilities.name: punitive income tax rates
